idea:
At LIVKON Pharmaceutical we strive to accelerate in advance medicines at affordable price and finding solutions for unmet needs like in-mouth saliva dissolvable medicines (Oral Films) which is much needed & useful for children, old age Individuals and other such bedridden patients who can’t swallow the wholesome tablets or capsules directly. What more our exclusively developed Oral Films are sugar free and it dissolves in 4-5 seconds in blood having faster effect.

Our portfolio consists of NOVEL DRUG DELIVERY SYSTEM i.e. ORALLY DISINTEGRATING STRIPS (ORAL THIN FILM) for various

products in Pharmaceutical, Nutraceuticals and Oral Care.

We develop & manufacture Novel Formulations in the form of “Oral Strips” of IMMUNO BOOSTER TO FIGHT AGAINST COVID-19 and other Virus & Disease.

For current marketed medicines/drugs or combinations of complementary medicine/drugs that addresses significant un-met needs and patient care.
name: Livkon Pharmaceutical Pvt Ltd

idea:
http://designqandy.com/home#


 DesignQandy is an "intelligent technology" based architectural design company. Created to harness the immense power of smart technology, networking, and Artificial Intelligence. Offering a seamless interaction between architects, clients, the world's best brands and all other stakeholders. DesignQandy is conceived to create customized well-designed spaces for homes / exclusive office spaces / concept restaurants and boutique hotels. The positive psychological impact of a well-designed space offers maximum convenience, increased comfort and an enhanced quality of life.We have an efficient network of prominent interior designers, architects, the best global brands, curated list of suppliers and dealers brought together by smart technology and shared infrastructure. Our network is dynamic and will evolve with every project and new city added, with more designers and suppliers joining in. DesignQandy will revolutionize the design and home décor industry in the country. Powered by smart technology, we will maximise convenience, minimise human effort and elevate the client's comfort and lifestyle.

DesignQandy is not onlyan online platform for Home design solution and end-to-end interior executionservices, but also an ecommerce platform of curated Home decor items, whitegoods and furniture.
name: DESIGNQANDY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Overview:

Nyva Store is a fast fashion e-commerce brand. Our focus is to give a unique product in a reasonable way with perfect fit. For some of our collection we will use "virtual size measurement" technology in our app so our customers get perfect fit. Our customers are young people who shun stereotypes and who want to feel good in whatever they are wearing.


Culture:

We hire creative individuals who brings out of the box ideas to the table. Our employees are motivated to read in their free time. We believe in regular discussions, brainstorming and growth for everyone.


Jobs:

Nyva Store has exceptional group of people who are committed to developing products, services and solutions that differentiate us in the marketplace. We are first Indian company to develop "virtual size measurement" technology in our app, so customers get perfect fit. Nyva Store is a brand focusing growth based on customer satisfaction, talent development and product excellence.Nyva is built upon fairness, opportunities and sense of responsibility towards our society. It is a brand, driven by desire to offer style, design & fashion to everyone around in a reasonable way.
name: Nyva Store

idea:
Queminder is a digital mobile app service developed by InGen Technologies.

It primarily allows users to lock their queue position in the nearby partnered establishments remotely from their location and notifies users to go when their turn arrives.
InGen Technologies is a technology startup company that focuses on the innovation of mobile and web-related products on present-day technologies.

The company has a strong team of developers, business development people, and mobile & web strategy people.

The company aims to develop products in the utility and socio-economic forefront.
name: Queminder
